actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Social Security.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to eliminate the earnings test for individuals age sixty-five and over.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to remove the limitation on the amount of outside income which beneficiaries aged 65 and over may earn without incurring a reduction in benefits.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to eliminate the earnings test for individuals age sixty-five and over.
